about_the_game:
LoYuno - Horror Escape is a 3D first-person quest horror game.

You have been kidnapped by a crazy girl. And your phone starts predicting her future for a short time. It's up to you to find out who she is, why this day doesn't end, and how to get out of this house.

Gameplay description:

You play the role of a simple guy who needs to get out of the kidnapper girl's house.
To escape you will have to explore your surroundings and find useful items that will open up access to new places in the house and lead you to the exit from the house.
But you have to be careful because if you try to escape, she might hear you and the day will start all over again.

Features:

Atmospheric graphics.
Interesting puzzles
Deep plot

name: LoYuno - Horror Escape

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 4600h
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1660 TI
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 4600h
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1660 TI
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
